mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_compo_appversion_day (year, month, day, appkey, componentkey, appversion, date, dayofweek, user, session) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{appkey}, #{componentkey}, #{appversion}, #{date}, #{dayofweek}, #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{session,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO cp_compo_appversion_week (year, week, appkey, componentkey, appversion, fromdate, todate, user, session) VALUES (#{year}, #{week}, #{appkey}, #{componentkey}, #{appversion}, #{fromdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{todate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{session,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO cp_compo_appversion_month (year, month, appkey, componentkey, appversion, user, session) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{appkey}, #{componentkey}, #{appversion}, #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{session,jdbcType=BIGINT})
